name: Restoring Touch
trigger: when you use Lay On Hands on a creature
effects: you can remove Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Paralyzed, or Stunned from the creature
limits: you must expend 5 hit points from the Lay On Hands pool for each condition you remove
